_header: Theophilus was a swith great man and good clerk he was also
Subjects: Theophilus, legend of; Virgin Mary, miracles of; miracles
_description: Theophilus, in the South English Legendary

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
TEofle was a swyþe gret man And guod clerk he was alsoHext
                    Maister bi fore alle oþere under þe bischope i do…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Wel fair miracle ore lauedi dude þat brouȝte him of
                    þulke woAse heo hath manye oþere idon and ȝeot heo wole wel
                    mo
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 288-93.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Theophle was gret man & gret clerk alsoHexte maister he
                    was ouer al vnder þe bisshop ydo…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…A fair miracle oure lady dide þat brought him of þilk
                    woAs she many oþer dide ȝet I mot telle mo
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

OxfTri57.First Lines:
Seint Theofle was a gret man and gret clerk al soHeyȝest
                    maister he was be fore alle opere y do…
OxfTri57.Last Lines:
…A fair meracle oure leuedy dude þat broȝte him out of
                    þulke woAs hy many oþer dude ȝut ich mot telle
                    mo

CULAdd2585c.First Lines:
…spedy pass [ ] þe aminoras [ ]ette hem in þe
                    facehym by þe biris þe…
CULAdd2585c.Last Lines:
…oche & þeron it mykan & þat ȝonder
                    honged

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Teofle was a riche manne & with a bischope dwellandeOf al his
                    clerkes gretteste he was & maistre I vnderstandeWhen his lorde þe
                    bischope was dede theoful was forth broghtTo be bischope after hym bot
                    þer of walde ne noght…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…Blissed mot þat lady be þat broght hym of his woto
                    þat lady pray we all þat sho vs helpe right so

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Sein theofle was a gret man & gret clerke alsoHeiost maister he
                    was biuore alle vnder þe bissop ido…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…A vair miracle oure leuedy dude þat broȝte him of
                    þulke woAs he monye oþere dude ȝute ich mot telle
                    mo
CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 221.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Thophile was a gret man and a goed clerk alsoheyest mayster
                    he was wiþ þe Bisschop and most ouer alle miȝte
                    do…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…A ffayre miracle oure lady dude þer þat brouYte him out
                    of þulke woAs ȝeo monye oþere haþ ydo wher of ȝut
                    ich mot telle mo

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint teofle was a grete man a grete clerke al soheyust maister he
                    was þo by for alle vndere þe bischop ydo…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…A fayre myracle oure leuedy dude þat broȝt hym of suche
                    woas heo many oþer dude ic mote telle mo

Digital Facsimile of Trinity College Cambridge MS R.3.25.

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEint theofle was a grete man & grete clerke alsoheyost maister
                    he was by fore alle vnder þe bissop y do
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…Elles hy hadde ssrewen y be for Miracle of þat childeOf
                    mo miracle me may ȝut telle of oure lady swete & milde
BLAdd10301.Attributed Title:
Theofle (f. 97v, by scribe in margin beside first line);
                        Teofle (RT)

BLCottCleoDIX.First Lines:
[S]Eint Teophle was a gret man & gret clerk alsoHext maister he
                    was of alle vnder þe bischop ido…
BLCottCleoDIX.Last Lines:
…A faire miracle oure leued dude þat brouȝte him out of
                    þulk woAs ȝeo mani anoþer dude þat ȝut ic mot
                    telle mo
BLCottCleoDIX.Note:
Folio number reflects the most recent foliation. Space left for enlarged
                    ‘S’, which was left blank.

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint theofle was a gret man & gret clerc alsohexst maister he was bifore alle vnþer þe bischop ido…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …a fair miracle our ladi dude þat broȝte him of þilke woas heo haþ moni oþer ido nou farewel y ne can telle no mo
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum Cvii” added to right margin by a later hand (f. 304); ends “Amen” (f. 307).

Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.

BLEge2891.Last Lines: …A uair miracle oure leuedi dude þat broȝte him of þulke woAs ȝo monie oþere dude ȝute ich mote telle mo

BLHar2277.Last Lines: …Aftvr miracle oure leuedi dude þat brouȝte him out of þulke woAs heo meni oþer dude ich mot ȝut telle mo

LeedsBro501.First Lines:
Seint Teophile was a grete man & a grete clerk alsoHeiest man
                    he was byfore all othir vndir the bisshop tho…
LeedsBro501.Last Lines:
…And ȝeue vs swete lady thy glorious luff þat we may here
                    suche grace wynneThat we may com to the ioye where thi blyssid sone and the
                    arne inne
LeedsBro501.Attributed Title:
Here beginnith Miraculis of our ladi seint Marie wiche is helpere &
                    louere of all senneris þat to hyr do wurship & loue as ye may se here
                    folwing (f. 117); Expliciunt Miracula Sancte Marie (f.
                    122v)
